name: Baomint Protect + Shine Oil Blend
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A premium blend of naturally derived oils formulated to invigorate and support the scalp while boosting shine and softness..Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Texture:Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:.Key Benefits:.Formulation:Oil.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free..What Else You Need to Know:This is a premium mix of natural oils that work together in balanced proportions to support shine and strength without feeling greasy. This oil is formulated for fast absorption into the hair strands.
ingredients: -Pomegranate Seed Oil: Supports the scalp..-Grapeseed Oil: Contains antioxidants that may help to block the production of DHT, a hormone that causes hair loss..-Fractionated Coconut Oil: Moisturizes the hair shaft...Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Fractionated Coconut Oil), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Lavandula (Lavender) Spica Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Menthol, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Oil.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a few drops to your hands and massage your scalp daily for optimal shine..-Use on fingertips to unravel your twist-outs and braid-outs or to fluff out your wash and go.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       .-Use alone or as a boost with adwoa beautyu2019s Deep Conditioner (sold separately) to maintain healthy hair and scalp..-May be used as a beard oil to add softness and shine. .-Can also be used sparingly as a body oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

It's very nice on the skin! It absorbed fast, no residue. I have some hair that is straight that I'm growing out from hot tool. Those portions of my hair do not look great with this oil, so I avoid them. It's probably not great for straight hair gals.
This oil is very thick and very fragranced. It didnu2019t add shine to my hair it made it look very greasy.

My spouse has used it both on his scalp and on his hair and it keeps his hair very moisturized. I have type 3c (and in some parts of my hair 3a&b) low porosity hair, my spouse has 4c low porosity hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a heavy product and if i dont watch how much I put on my hair, it will weigh down my hair.

reviews.review_title: Nice product, but now I smell like a car freshener
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love what it does to my hair. It adds shine, cuts some frizz, and defines my curls. I put it on dry hair, though i'm sure it would be even better on wet hair. Only thing is... it smells like a car. Like the little trees 'black ice' car freshener. Literally. Kinda minty, leathery, vanilla, and very sweet. At least it smells like a clean car. And the smell lingers, too. So that being said, could cut back on the smell just slightly. But other than that, cool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say, it's an amazing oil!! So versatile. I use it on my scalp for Deep Conditioning (my hair length has been thanking me ever since), I use it on my body for a luxurious, natural fragrance, I use it for beard care, and I use it to fluff up my roots in the morning! It leaves a beautiful shine on the hair.
It smelt so bad. Returned it. It didnu2019t work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All of the Adwoa products have done wonders for my hair! I love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s an okay oil for your hair...but the smell. I tried it on my hair and the smell was so strong and awful that I had to take a shower to get it off of me. Itu2019s minty in a black licorice way. Ask a beauty advisor if you can smell the product before you buy it. Iu2019m taking this stuff back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS OIL!!! The most luxurious oil Iu2019ve ever used. Keeps my hair shiny and new and not heavy.

reviews.review_title: Soothing and refreshing oil for my scalp
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil makes my scalp so happy. I've been using this product since 2018 and its drastically improved the health of my scalp. I used to have flakes, itchiness, and dandruff. I haven't had any of that since I started using the baomint oil. At this point I've gotten my sister, her boyfriend, and my mom to use this oil and they all love it. I have thick natural hair and the nozzle does a great job of getting to my scalp. I highly recommend this!
This isnu2019t an oil thatu2019s just gonna sit on your skin. It absorbs very nicely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the multi-functionality of this oil. It can be used on both skin and hair. You can add it to your conditioner if you like. It has a wonderful minty fresh scent. Very high quality oil blend. No regrets purchasing this oil ever.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the u201choly grailu201d product I wanted to tame my frizz, but better than any other oil Iu2019ve tried and very good for curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a world class product! I recently suffered from postpartum shedding and lost all the hair on my edges. Iu2019ve been applying this oil consistently and my hair is started to fill back in. It has trying been my saving grace for my thinning hair after my baby.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: All oils are not the same, this is a standout oil! Lightweight, minty and can be used to lock in moisture on your skin with the great Baomint smell that lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The minute this product touched my scalp, you could feel the tingling sensation.  My processed platinum 4b/c hair ...just swallowed every bit of this solution and burped.....well fed moisturized hair...LOL.  If I could give 20 stars I would.  Will be a staple for future purchases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The oil itself is nice, it sinks onto my hair and it doesn't feel greasy. You get a lot of oil for your money compared to other brands. I do like everything about it except for the smell. The smell is really bad to me and it lingers forever. If the smell wore off, it would be OK but I can smell it all day. Its this strong cheap minty smell that make me want to hurl. I am going to use this as a pre-wash only till its gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very thin hair oil I recommend keeping it only on the very ends. It is very easy to over do it and make your hair go from shiny healthy looking hair to greasy. Decent for the price and size Hard to travel with I recommend a hair cream over an oil if you are looking for a healthy looking hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SMELLS HORRIBLE!! I read reviews before I ordered and Iu2019m surprised how no one mentioned the overpowering smell !!! The oil smells like sweet fennel and I am sure NO one wants to be walking around smelling like the pantry .. I couldnu2019t get it off my pillow and ended up returning the oil, not before everyone around me questioned whatever smell was I wearing in my hair. Stay away !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil blend was the best Iu2019ve ever used. It is rich, does not weigh your hair down. The shine ads back the youthfulness I lost when I was using chemicals years ago. My scalp loves it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, is perfect my hair . I would like buy more soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels really good on the scalp and works as a great oil for the LOC method.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did moisturize my hair. But I think it was a little heavy for me or maybe I put a little to much in. My daughter has very textured curly hair and it would definitely work for her. I do recommend for medium thickness hair but Iu2019d say a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with products from this line and I just started using them because they are so wonderful for the hair!!  I don't want to be without them.  Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly wavy kinky northern European hair, coarse as horsehair when I was younger, but fine and curly wavy kinky now that I am in my sixties. it's hurricane weather here on the gulf coast (100% humidity), and I have put a TON of this product on my hair since the last wash.  and, no, I haven't ironed my hair either! seriously, folks I can finger comb this through without pulling out handfuls of hair, and I'm not forming those knots that have to be cut out. my hair is not sticky or nasty even with this much product on. the stuff is awesome!

reviews.review_title: LIGHT BUT STRONG. NOT GREASY AT ALL. SMELLS GREAT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is amazing! Really the entire line! That's all I use on a weekly basis for over a year now and no complaints. The products are always consistent and a little goes a long way. Everyone talks about the price but you get double the size as most natural hair brands for better quality products and clean ingredients. I really dont get it, it's like they compare apples to oranges lol. When you do the math it is actually cheaper for the amount of ounces you get. But oh well! I guess most people do do the math like me lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only oil I use, I love the cool refreshing scent. I add it in my lotions too for my skin.

reviews.review_title: You need this!! Lightweight and smells great!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im usually kind of weird about hair oils because half the time I feel like they sit on top of my hair/scalp and cause more issues than they're worth. This product is definitely worth it though. I have 4A-B hair (if you hair type!) with low porosity and it does WONDERS for helping me moisturize my hair and scalp. Like most oils, a little goes a long way and like all the products in this line - it smells GREAT. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the entire line and switch my hair. I have used this oil exclusively for over two years. I have now transitioned into locs and tried other oils but my hair still only wants this product. From kinky natural hair to locs and even on my skin, this is hands down the best oil blend I have had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil works wonders on my hair. And everywhere else! it's light with a light, slightly sweet, slightly fresh scent. The consistency reminds me most of jojoba oil, just a tad bit heavier. It melts into my hair and skin, and I'll always have a bottle on hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the versatility of this oil! Fun fact you can use it on your skin as well. A little goes a long way but I usually follow the LCO Method (leave in /liquid , cream/butter , and oil). It works well with the other products in this line as well as with different brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is a treat. I love how minty and fresh my scalp feels after I massage in this oil. It smells AMAZING! I didnu2019t originally purchase the oil when I first purchase these products. However, the oil came in my trial kit and I purchased the large size following falling in love with it. The ENTIRE line is amazing. If you want products that do what they u201cclaimu201d to do, purchase these products now!! My 4b/c hair loves them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: One of the best oils Iu2019ve used to date! It doesnu2019t build up on your scalp. A little goes a long way! It gives my hair an amazing shine! It doesnu2019t weigh my hair down or make it appear oily. It so bomb! Also, Iu2019ve mixed a little bit with my lotion and letu2019s just say, my body loves it as much as my hair! Multi Use!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect oil for your scalp and your body. Stops my scalp from being itchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair and scalp oil is amazing. Itu2019s light but very moisturizing. I even use it in my babyu2019s hair! The event is of mint and pomegranate. My hair canu2019t live without this!! Itu2019s fresh ingredients prove to be of the best quality because my curls are in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried the travel kit, which included this oil, prior to it being sold at sephora stores and, honestly, it was my favorite thing in the package besides the deep conditioner. It has a great smell and a little goes a long way. The peppermint stimulates your scalp and gives it an overall good feeling. While it's on the expensive side, I do plan to purchase again in the future.
